pages.text:
About Us
Welcome to Canon Coffee, your cozy corner in Apopka where community and great coffee come together! Founded in 2018, we’re passionate about serving you the finest brews made from ethically sourced beans.
At Canon Coffee, we believe that every cup tells a story. Our skilled baristas are dedicated to crafting each drink with care, whether you’re enjoying a classic espresso or one of our seasonal specialties. But it’s not just about the coffee; it’s about creating a space where friends gather, ideas spark, and memories are made.
We’re proud to support local artisans and farmers, sourcing fresh beans from our local roastery weekly. Stop by for a warm house-made pastry, grab a book from our little library, or simply relax and soak in the inviting atmosphere.
Thank you for being part of our story. We can’t wait to share a cup with you!
END .sqs-gallery-meta-container

Host an Event
Thank you for considering Canon Coffee as the venue for your upcoming special event! Whether you're planning a birthday party, a masterclass, or any other gathering, we're here to make it memorable. Please fill out the form below with details about your event, and our team will get in touch with you shortly to discuss availability, options, and any special requests you may have.
We look forward to hosting you and your guests at Canon Coffee!

Thank you for your request. Our team will contact you as soon as possible for details and confirmation. If you do not hear from us within 24 hours, please call the store at (407)703-4359. We look forward to hosting you!
